Text:
I installed it, and replaced, .exe file with the one in the cracked folder, but I am still getting Get activation code message. 
What did I do wrong?

I get the same as Akando

To crack it, you have to put all the files located in the crack folder into pamela's directory, not just the .exe.

@ionlyknow
Where is the crack folder? I open "pamela.for.skype.professional.v4.8.0.42-ismail.exe" crack file and it says that it patches something... and it creates a file called "Pamela.exe" and then nothing else happens.

I don't see any folders created anywhere, and if I open up Pamela.exe it just opens up the program. I exchanged the original Pamela.exe file (in the program folder) with the newly-created Pamela.exe, I don't get any registration popups, but I still see a link "Get Activition code" near the bottom left, as well as registration links in the "Help" dropdown menu.

Did I do it right?
Edit: It doesn't create the file Pamela.exe; Pamela.exe is already in the folder. (No other files are in the folder, just the patch file.)
